recommended_action: Address EARLY_BEARING_DEGRADATION: Check lubrication levels immediately.
Schedule bearing replacement within 5–10 days if symptoms persist.
Monitor rapid temperature spike and vibration trends closely.
safety_note: Before inspecting bearings, ensure the machine is powered down and locked out to prevent injury.
reference: Bearing_Maintenance_Manual.pdf (Section 4.2 Early Bearing Wear), Vibration Anomaly (Section 4.1), Bearing Degradation (Section 4.2)
